Info.Title: Jingle All the Way 2
Info.Writer: Randy Kornfield (based on "Jingle All the Way" written by), Stephen Mazur
Info.Actors: Larry the Cable Guy, Brian Stepanek, Anthony Carelli, Kennedi Clements
Info.Plot: Larry's daughter wants only one thing for Christmas, a talking bear. His daughter's stepdad intends to make sure that Larry can't get one.
